root.name: Kinect Nat Geo TV
root.description: OverviewKinect Nat Geo TV is an interactive television series developed by Relentless and published by Microsoft for the Xbox 360 on September 18, 2012. Part of the Kinect TV series (released alongside Kinect Sesame Street TV), players watch special episodes of content from the educational wildlife-related television channel Nat Geo Wild while interacting in various activites with the Kinect.The game is distributed in two forms: as a retail disc (originally retailed for $29.99, which includes all eight episodes and codes for the downloadable version) and as a downloadable app (in which each episode can be purchased separately for 400 msp ($5) each). Both versions come with their own sets of achievements.
